question: Who will become the first female president of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE)?
explanation: The New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) has named Stacey Cunningham its first female President in the history of the 226-year-old exchange. She will succeed Thomas Farley on May 25, 2018. Currently, she is the Chief Operating Officer (COO) of NYSE. With Cunningham\'s promotion, America\'s leading two stock exchanges will be led by women after Adena Friedman took over as CEO of Nasdaq in January 2017.
